body_content.explanation: to make something into small pieces or a powder for a second, third, etc. time by pressing it between hard surfaces :
examples: Sift out the large almond chunks, regrind them, and sift again.
Any oversized material is removed and returned to the mill to be re-ground.

body_content.explanation: to rub something for a second, third, etc. time against a hard surface in order to make it sharper or smoother:
examples: Keep this in mind when regrinding a screwdriver’s tip.
He planned to re-grind the sides of the box.
